content: This clause describes activities for cybersecurity validation at the vehicle level for the item, considering configurations intended for series production.
The objectives of this clause are to:
a) validate the cybersecurity goals and cybersecurity claims;
b) confirm that the item achieves the cybersecurity goals; and
c) confirm that no unreasonable risks remain.

description: Validation activities at the vehicle level for the item, considering configurations for series production, shall confirm:
a) adequacy of the cybersecurity goals with respect to threat scenarios and corresponding risks;
b) achievement of the cybersecurity goals of the item;
c) validity of the cybersecurity claims; and
d) validity of the requirements on the operational environment, if applicable.
A rationale for the selection of validation activities shall be provided.
